snippet: The tiny losses reflected investor worries over weaker global growth, even as the dollar reached a one-year high against the euro.
abstract: Stock market posts minor loss as investors' concerns over weaker global growth appear to overshadow strong reports about the American economy.
lead_paragraph: The tiny losses reflected investor worries over weaker global growth, even as the dollar reached a one-year high against the euro.

headline.main: Market Slips Slightly, Despite Positive U.S. Economic News
headline.print_headline: Market Slips Slightly, Despite Positive U.S. Economic News
